function.name: str_replace_editor

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/solution.py
+++ /workspace/solution.py
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+import sys
@@ -1,0 +3,78 @@
+def main():
+    data = sys.stdin.buffer.read().split()
+    it = iter(data)
+    n = int(next(it))
+    q = int(next(it))
+    s = list(next(it).decode())
+
+    # Special case: length 1 string has no adjacent pairs
+    if n == 1:
+        out_lines = []
+        for _ in range(q):
+            t = int(next(it))
+            l = int(next(it)); r = int(next(it))
+            if t == 2:
+                out_lines.append("Yes")
+        sys.stdout.write("\n".join(out_lines))
+        return
+
+    # A[i] = 1 if s[i] == s[i+1] else 0, for i in [0..n-2]
+    A = [1 if s[i] == s[i+1] else 0 for i in range(n-1)]
+    size = n - 1
+
+    # Fenwick / BIT for range sum on A
+    bit = [0] * (size + 1)
+    def bit_add(idx, val):
+        i = idx + 1
+        while i <= size:
+            bit[i] += val
+            i += i & -i
+    def bit_sum(idx):
+        i = idx + 1
+        s_ = 0
+        while i > 0:
+            s_ += bit[i]
+            i -= i & -i
+        return s_
+    def range_sum(l, r):
+        if l > r:
+            return 0
+        return bit_sum(r) - (bit_sum(l-1) if l > 0 else 0)
+
+    for i, val in enumerate(A):
+        if val:
+            bit_add(i, val)
+
+    out_lines = []
+    for _ in range(q):
+        t = int(next(it))
+        l = int(next(it))
+        r = int(next(it))
+        if t == 1:
+            # Flip operation toggles A[l-2] and A[r-1] (0-based) if they exist
+            if l > 1:
+                idx = l - 2
+                old = A[idx]
+                new = 1 - old
+                A[idx] = new
+                bit_add(idx, new - old)
+            if r < n:
+                idx = r - 1
+                old = A[idx]
+                new = 1 - old
+                A[idx] = new
+                bit_add(idx, new - old)
+        else:
+            # Query: substring s[l-1:r] is good iff there are no equal adjacencies
+            if l == r:
+                out_lines.append("Yes")
+            else:
+                left = l - 1
+                right = r - 2
+                out_lines.append("Yes" if range_sum(left, right) == 0 else "No")
+
+    sys.stdout.write("\n".join(out_lines))
+
+if __name__ == "__main__":
+    main()
+
